headline: Does lululemon (LULU) Face a Turning Point in Governance and Brand Control After Get Low Misstep?
summary: Earlier in January 2026, lululemon athletica temporarily paused North American online sales of its new Get Low collection after customers complained about sheerness and fit, while founder Chip (Dennis J.) Wilson launched a proxy campaign to replace board directors and push a new business proposal at the 2026 annual meeting. The combination of product quality issues, leadership turnover, and renewed founder activism raises questions about lululemon’s governance, brand control, and ability to...
